Cmp3\Cache

Class HashFile

Cmp3\Cache\SimpleFileCache
Cmp3\Cache\HashFile
public class HashFile
extends SimpleFileCache

Simple hashed file handling
Example
$objCache = new \Cmp3\Cache\HashFile($strOutputPath, 'png');
$objCache->SetTag('w', $intWidth); $objCache->SetTag('h', $intHeight); $objCache->SetTag('data', serialize($MyData));
if (!$objCache->isValid()) {
// Create the pChart object $myPicture = new pImage($intWidth, $intHeight, $MyData);
// Render the picture (choose the best way) $myPicture->Render($objCache->GetFilePath()); }
echo '<img src="' . htmlspecialchars($this->MakePathRelative($objCache->GetFilePath())) . '" width="' . $intWidth . '" height="' . $intHeight . '" />';
